::DarkMouse::

She stopped laughing and responded in a very serious tone."Sorry 
commander. But it's important. I'm picking up activity at the maximal 
camp. There is a predacon and maximal fight there. I thought KitKat2 
should know of it if she's to return to her old possition."

::KitKat2::
She smiled and kissed Drillbit passionately. "It's ok. We will find 
time for things like that later on. Won't we?" And with that,she got 
up and went to the security station. 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He heard Dark Mouse over the commlink, and broke the kiss.
> "Damn."
> He looked up at the security camera.
> "Dark Mouse, you had to spoil my fun, huh?"
